task.summary: Fixed wake-on-lan module after previous fix
Created authorization and some frontend changes
Small changes in administration front end
Connected to MySQL and implemented CRUD operations
Fixed bug with wrong publication date. Swiched to Java 8 Date Time API
Some changes in UI and database
Some changes in UI and database
Fixed bug with WOL module, small changes in administration servlet
Changes in DB working algorithm. Now it app can create schema starting from MYSQL 5.5.55
fixed client real ip resolving behind enginx
add ability to edit about page, configured pom.xml, minor changes in administration
